head: Divorce Notice.
ab: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Thurston.
p: In the United States District Court of the Second Judicial Dist. of W. T., holding terms at Olympia. November Term, 1866.
Margaret Farr, vs Petition for Divorce. Joseph Farr.

YOU ARE HEREBY NOTIFIED that Margaret Farr. Plaintiff herein, has filed a complaint against you in said court, which will come on to be heard at the first term of the court, which shall commence more than two months after the 11th day of August, 1866, and unless you appear at said term and answer the same will be taken as confessed, and the prayer thereof granted.
The object and prayer of said complaint is in dissolve the bonds of matrimony now existing between you and the plaintiff, on the grounds of desertion and abandonment and for other strong causes.
